<h3 id="X15271">X(15271)&nbsp;=&nbsp;CENTER OF THE PERSPECONIC OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC AND CIRCUMMEDIAL</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-3*(b^2+c^2)*a^2-4*b^2*c^2  :  :
<br>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (2*SA + SB + SC)*SW + 2*S^2 : :
<br>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2 cot A + cot B + cot C + 2 tan &omega; : :
<p>
